articles.author: Ariel Zilber
articles.title: JPMorgan, Bank of America to crack down on long work hours after death of Leo Lukenas — who logged 100 hours per week - New York Post
articles.description: Two of Wall Street’s largest banks are reportedly planning to clamp down on the number of hours that junior bankers work per week in the wake of outrage over the tragic death of a 35-year-old…
